attributes.action: make the NHS free at the point of use for British (and EU) citizens.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Currently for one particular NHS service, for just a check-up I could have to pay £16.20.  For more complex work I might have to pay £44.60 or £198.  

There are charges beyond dentistry - if I need a prescription, that's £7.10 from my pocket.  An NHS sight test, to decide whether I need NHS glasses is £19.32.

This is hardly free at the point of use.  NHS Sight tests, NHS dentistry, prescriptions written out by NHS doctors, these should all be free.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
